text: Ruin (often stylized as RUIN) is an American thrash metal band from Portland, Maine, formed in 2005.http://www.RUINBand.net/bio Ruin's latest album Rite of Passage debuted in October 2014. == Members == === Current === * Richard Carey – guitar and vocals * Craig Carey – drums * Kevin Whitman – guitar * Todd Biddwell – bass ===Former=== * Ken Vought – former guitarist (2005–2012) == Discography == * Hands of Enmity (2007) * Human Moral Deception (2009) * Rite of Passage (2014) == References == == External links == *Official website Category:Musical groups established in 2005 Category:American thrash metal musical groups
title: Ruin (American band)
